Package ohos.powermanager

Class PowerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.powermanager.PowerManager

  • public class PowerManager
extends Object
    Provides interfaces to manage power.

    The interfaces can be used to restart the system, use RunningLock, and obtain the power status DevicePowerStatusInfo.

    Since:
    1

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  PowerManager.PowerState
      Indicates the power status of a device.
      class  PowerManager.RunningLock
      Provides a mechanism to prevent the system from hibernating so that the applications can run in the background or when the screen is off.
      static class  PowerManager.RunningLockType
      Enumerates the RunningLock types.

      • PowerManager

        public PowerManager​()

    • Method Detail

      • rebootDevice

        public void rebootDevice​(String reason)
        Restarts the system.

        This method requires the ohos.permission.REBOOT permission.

        Parameters:
        reason - Indicates the restart reason. For example, recovery indicates entering the recovery mode after the restart. If the parameter is not specified, the system enters the normal mode after the restart.
        Since:
        1

      • getCurrentPowerStatusInfo

        public DevicePowerStatusInfo getCurrentPowerStatusInfo​()
        Obtains the DevicePowerStatusInfo interface.

        The DevicePowerStatusInfo interface can be used to obtain power status information.

        Returns:
        Returns the DevicePowerStatusInfo interface.
        Since:
        1

      • isRunningLockTypeSupported

        public boolean isRunningLockTypeSupported​(PowerManager.RunningLockType type)
        Checks whether the specified RunningLockType is supported.
        Parameters:
        type - Indicates the specified RunningLockType.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the specified RunningLockType is supported; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        4

      • createRunningLock

        public PowerManager.RunningLock createRunningLock​(String name,
                                                  PowerManager.RunningLockType type)
        Creates a RunningLock object.

        This method requires the ohos.permission.RUNNING_LOCK permission.

        The RunningLock object can be used to perform a lock operation to prevent the system from hibernating.

        Parameters:
        name - Indicates the RunningLock name. A recommended name consists of the package or class name and a suffix.
        type - Indicates the RunningLockType.
        Returns:
        Returns the RunningLock object.
        Since:
        1

      • isScreenOn

        public boolean isScreenOn​()
        Checks whether the screen of a device is on or off.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the screen is on; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1
